attributes.additional_details:
This man has quite simply brought the country together in support of the galant NHS staff in a way that simply could not be imagined.

He has done so with grace and humility and the British Government led by our Prime Minister, Boris Johnson, should bestow the honour of a Knighthood on him and bow in thanks of his service to this country.
attributes.background: In recognition of his epic garden walk that has galvanised the true spirit of this nation’s generosity and gratitude, Captain Tom Moore should be Knighted for his 100th birthday on April 30th 2020

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
